May peace and unity always bless your realm
May strength and vigor bless your rule
May the Divine guide your path
May good health be with you

send a skilled man from your court to serve [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] personally

make a grand gesture to [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] showing your honor and respect

it is rather simplistic and not terribly impressive.
it was a solidly average effort, but nothing more.
it makes some very excellent and intriguing points!
it could well revolutionize our understanding on this topic!
the origins of the Trinity in the era before the Messiah
the Qabalah's relationship to Hermes Trismegistus
how unity with the One is achieved
the nature of the Prima materia
the nature of the Inner and the Outer cosmos

whether snails, due to their spiral shells, are the most Divine creatures
whether snakes and staves are symbolically the exact same thing
how it's always lead that must be transmuted into gold, when beer is just as noble
the highly medicinal applications of alcohol "when applied internally"
a Quaternity as the answer instead of Trismegistus Trinity
whether it's true that I have an emerald tablet at home or not
the crazy things that happened at the last Great Debate
how it would be incredible if the soul could leave the body temporarily, then return
who is more important in the Divine hierarchy, kings or angels
that perhaps eternal torment is not as bad as the laity has been led to believe
the pains and troubles that come with eternal life
the top ten alchemists of all time
that feeling of Divine presence you get from smelling certain liquids at the moment of synthesis
whether gardening is best left for servants, or secretly the most noble work one can do
the obvious reasons for why alchemists make better lovers
You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.
You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.\nThis will help with your withdrawal, but use comes at a risk.
You are left confused, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
You smile triumphantly, encouraged by the accuracy of your vision
You lock yourself in your quarters, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
You smile cheerfully, reassured by the accuracy of your vision
You shake your head, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
You smile blissfully, pleased by the accuracy of your vision
You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
You are pleased, yet confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
You are pleased, but also confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
You feel heart-broken, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision

somehow reminds me of something funny
somehow remind me of something funny
is gross, even in a glass jar
are gross, even when they're preserved in a glass jar
has an eerie color to it
have an eerie color to them
is sort of disgusting to look at
might be taking up too much space in my laboratory
does not really send a message I can identify with
do not really send a message I can identify with
doesn't really contribute to the decor of my [Root.GetCapitalHolding]
don't really contribute to the decor of my [Root.GetCapitalHolding]
is somewhat nice to look at
are somewhat nice to look at
could perhaps possess some hidden properties
makes my nose twitch from its reeking
make my nose twitch from their reeking
way of making me really consider what makes a good person
way of challenging me to think outside of the box
appreciation for the small things in life
always way of seeing the best in people
how the realm is so wealthy, and every inch of the Middle Kingdom seems to be used to house or nourish its people
how the paper they write on is so strangely white and soft
how the Middle Kingdom is so full of life, and there are people everywhere
the entertainment found in the streets of one particular Chinese town – there would be jugglers, marionettes, acrobats, as well as shadow plays and mysterious storytellers
the Chinese custom of celebrating their gods' birthdays – they hold festivals, where both actors and priests paint their faces and perform songs of magic ritual together
how any water route through a Chinese town seems to be constantly crowded by traffic, with ships and boats everywhere
how the Chinese have some truly artisan pottery – one type is made to look as if it has shattered, yet it somehow holds together, as if by magic
the melody of the Chinese language, and the delicate intonations of certain words
the magnificent architecture of the many religious buildings found throughout the realm
the details of a religious ceremony, involving water-turtles being thrown back into the water they were fished from
a pleasure trip made on a beautiful lake, and the magnificent landscape of the Empire
the construction of certain Chinese boats, with fine carvings painted in bright colors, and how they always carry names such as 'Hundred Flowers' or 'Golden Lion'
the food of the Middle Kingdom, involving delicious shellfish, vegetables, fruit, and sweetmeats
the intricacies of Chinese government and the seemingly supernatural efficiency displayed by its scholar-officials
the level of literary and artistic sensibility the Chinese display, and the elegance of their calligraphy
how there was always people, too much people, and [This.GetSheHe] still has trouble hearing [This.GetHerselfHimself] think
their incessant use of firecrackers, constantly scaring [This.GetHerHis] wits out of [This.GetHerHim]
poor weather and an impenetrable language barrier
the beauty of old things, and the many trinkets we keep in our treasuries
grooming routines, and the many ways one can comb one's hair
altruism, and the value of everyday kindness
how being a councilor is not always a walk in the park, yet ultimately worth it
how being on the council of [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] is sort of a drag sometimes
boredom, and the inconvenience of being confined to one's chamber, due to illness
physical ailments, and what a nuisance they are
the elitism of people who insist on using fancy words to say simple things
how a diplomatic education benefits everyone, if done right
how much fun it was to undergo an education that involved reading, but also between the lines
the smell of old tomes, and the strictness of our respective childhood tutors
the importance of well-educated military personnel within one's entourage
how it's easy to underestimate the actually very tangible value of good stewardship
the hypocrisy of society's obsession with selflessness
how I should spend more time with my falcons, and what it would be like to soar through the sky like they do
the surprisingly mild weather, compared to last year
the intricacies of a well functioning administration, and the skill of delegating
everything that supposedly, and actually, can happen during an extravagant feast
the value of kinship, and the importance of family
the thrill of hunting, and the outdoors life
the intrigues at court, and an enticing rumor about a certain foreign diplomat
the sometimes thankless effort of trying to do right by your administration, as well as your people
human curiosity, and the sometimes debated concept of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
the undeniable excitement and joy one gets from pursuing one's true passions, in this earthly life
ways to interpret a holy text, and the comforting aspects of faith
our mutual fascination for battle and strategy
the longing to spend more time in the gardens, and the most recent additions of to its scenery
hunting, and the elusiveness of a certain white beast
the pains and pleasures of being human
the stinging of a fresh wound, and the constant reminder it is
the landscape of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and particularly around [Root.Capital.GetName]
the joy of meeting a fellow scholar
the judgment from some people, in regards to being [This.GetMediumDisabilityDesc]
the intangible qualities of the fabric of our reality, and how little we actually know about it
how old age often makes one wish for times long gone
the modern tendency to underestimate the value of prayer and contemplation
witty insights and observations on human behavior
poetry, alliterations, and our favorite stanzas
the finer points of [Root.Culture.GetName] culture and etiquette
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, and our favorite hymns
the various things we get up to, as members of [This.Society.GetName]
the privilege of a good education, and the similarity of our backgrounds
the intricacies of spoken language, and the differences between intonation and melody
the complexities of the human mind, and whether certain animals can truly count as sentient or not
humor, and particularly when it arises as the result of logical fallacies
the pains of living every day, and the encompassing pressure we are all constantly under
the importance of a strict personal exercise regime, and how it seems to come natural to some people
the privilege of a good education, and the comfort that comes from excelling in academia
shallowness, and certain people's fascination with grooming routines
social norms and the value of being straightforward, rather than pretending politeness
perceptions of beauty, and the silly notion that it is aided by the physical strength of a person
how regressive it can feel to discuss politics with the older generation
unable to keep a straight back
We will try to make use of the tribute you sent us
However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] does not seem very sharp
However, for fear of scaring our subjects, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] will be performing [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] duties away from the public eye
However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] is, so far, not very likable
[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] illustrates well the level of the educational system you keep in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
However, we were hoping [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] would prove more capable within the sphere of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] interests
However, it is disappointing that the child seems wildly uninterested in worldly knowledge
While disappointed, we will try to make use of the Eunuch
[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] has only a modest education, but might still do well at our court
While not very impressed by [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName], we are flattered to receive your [person_sent_as_tribute.GetRootRelation]
It is satisfactory, how [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] occasionally comes off as well-spoken
[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] could, with some training, become somewhat skilled in the military arts
[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] shows something of an aptitude, and will be trained by our scholar-bureaucrats
It is satisfactory that, while not obvious, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] shows signs of a sly intellect
It is adequate, how [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] might grow into a learned [person_sent_as_tribute.GetManWoman]
While seemingly lacking in intellectual prowess, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] possess an admirable physique, and will suffice for manual labor
The wits of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] has a good chance of being entertaining to us
It is fitting that you have sent a rather aesthetically pleasing subject to serve us
We will hopefully enjoy the architect you have sent us
We shall hopefully enjoy the strategist you have sent us
Pray we enjoy the scholarly mind of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]
We shall probably enjoy the faqih you have sent us

[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] is bound to impress with [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] education

[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] seems to possess a well-organized mind, and will serve our bureaucrats well

The Chinese Civil War is over and the last rebel bastion has fallen
The Chinese Civil War is over and the last rebel bastion has fallen, yet the turmoil in the [offmap_china.GetFullName] is not over..
The Great Famine in China is finally over
The Chinese Golden Age appears to be over
The Jurchen hordes have given up on their ill-fated invasion of China
The Mongol hordes have given up on their ill-fated invasion of China
The Pale Rider is done reaping his terrible harvest in China and the Devastating Plague appears to have receded
The status quo in China is over
The period of Unrest in China has come to an end and the surviving militant peasants have returned to till their fields
The period of Unrest in China has dramatically worsened
I am admittedly, a bit disappointed in my scribes. '[new_book.GetName]' is not exactly what I had in mind.
'This is not bad', I murmur, to the relief of my scribes.
The scribes are almost crying in relief, and I am in nothing short of awe of our hard work.
Frankly, I find myself a little disappointed in my scribes, but I also blame myself. 'It's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], is it not?' I mutter.
I am not sure what I was expecting, but '[new_book.GetName]' is certainly.... something?
'Excellent!' I commend my scribes, while I gently leaf through '[new_book.GetName]'.
I stare at the book, '[new_book.GetName]'. My scribes are silent, exchanging awkward glances.
'[new_book.GetName], huh?' I scratch my chin, almost surprised that work has finally been finished.
Smiling broadly, I can't help but swell with a sense of well-deserved pride.
It's not exactly what I expected...!
the better part of a lifetime
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] is no longer with me, and I still feel it, in my bones
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] is not around anymore, and I still don't understand why [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had to leave
Even if I have done my best to accept that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is gone, it still pains me
I hate to admit how accustomed I was to having my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] around
Sometimes, when I think about my late [FromFrom.GetRootRelation], my blood begins to boil over the meaninglessness of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] passing
Even if death touches everyone's life, I can't stop dreaming about seeing my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] again
Sometimes, I still see [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] – in the corner of my eye, or far off in a crowd. I'd know [FromFrom.GetHerHis] silhouette anywhere
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] is no longer with me, and I am only slowly coming to grips with the reality of it
a notable prelate of the Church
A terrible sandstorm has engulfed my entourage, blinding the horses and leaving us lost in the desert.
A terrible storm has caught my entourage, deafening us all night with thunders and leaving us sore and completely damp in the morning.
By the time [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crawls on the vomit-splattered ground to reach for me, I am barely conscious enough to recognize [From.GetHerHim].
[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] finds me under the table, halfway asleep, holding my distended belly and containing an onset of nausea.
When I finally spot [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] on the pile of bodies I am already exhausted and covered in sweat.
We are married! If anything was to spark between us, shouldn't it already have happened?
[This.GetSheHeCap] may be unmarried and alone, but what if that is what [This.GetSheHe] prefers?
What if [This.GetSheHe] finds me too young, my feelings fickle and easy to disregard?
Would I not simply seem an old fool, yearning more youthful feelings?
What could a lowly [Root.GetTitle] have to offer the [This.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [This.GetTitledName]?
We already parted ways once, why would [This.GetSheHe] want me now?
What if this ruins our friendship?
We probably have NOTHING in common.
we are married, and it might be folly to dream of more than a practical arrangement
I am used to being alone
[This.GetSheHe] might find me young and inexperienced
[This.GetSheHe] might see me as too old
a lowly [Root.GetTitle] might not have a lot to offer a [This.GetTitle]
it could put our friendship at risk
[From.GetSheHe] was my enemy during the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]
we might have nothing in common
And I was not pleased by how uncaring and distant [From.GetTitledFirstName] was during the entire ceremony, and by how quickly [From.GetSheHe] dismissed me from court.
And I was pleased to receive [From.GetTitledFirstName] formal blessing and permission to return to my demesne as soon as the ceremony was over.
And I was not too impressed by how crass and direct [From.GetTitledFirstName] was when giving me [From.GetHerHis] blessing.
And I was glad [From.GetTitledFirstName] treated me with respect and a friendly attitude, almost as if we were equal.
And I was beyond furious when [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to mock me for not presenting myself in good enough conditions for [From.GetHerHis] standards.
And when [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to mock me for my poor conditions, I felt incredibly ashamed with myself.
And I was a bit scared when [From.GetFirstName] ordered to remain with [From.GetHerHim] to play games.
And I was far happier to hear that [From.GetFirstName] wants me to be one of [From.GetHerHis] playmates!
And I was not able to ignore [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lecherous eyes examining me for the entire duration of the ceremony.
And I was quite pleased to see [From.GetTitledFirstName] lingering over my features with craving eyes.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for nearly a week, entertaining me with stories about [From.GetHerHis] recent deeds and organizing a few luxurious feasts in my honor.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for a few days, spending entire afternoons entertaining me with [From.GetHerHis] exotic strategy games.
[From.GetFirstName] organized the most lavish celebrations for my visit. Day and night, [From.GetSheHe] subjected me to an uninterrupted barrage of feasting and entertainment.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for nearly a week, but I saw very little of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetHouse] outside of [From.GetHerHis] small alchemical study.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for nearly a week, but I saw very little of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetHouse] outside of [From.GetHerHis] large library.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for nearly a week, introducing me to all the newest, most important members of [From.GetHerHis] court, and being all-around amicable.
During my long visit, [From.GetFirstName] showed me some of the amazing architectural wonders in [From.Capital.GetName] whose construction [From.GetSheHe] has overseen.
During my long visit, [From.GetFirstName] guided me throughout [From.GetHerHis] demesne. We explored the countryside and some of the most breathtaking sights that [From.Capital.GetName] can offer.
During my long visit, [From.GetFirstName] entertained me with many stories about [From.GetHerHis] past fights, describing all actions in great detail.
[From.GetFirstName] is truly attached to [From.GetHerHis] birds. [From.GetSheHe] spent an entire day of my visit just to show me [From.GetHerHis] most prized hawks.
Most of my visit to [From.GetFirstName] was spent in my host's garden: a truly amazing construction to behold, [From.GetFirstName] must have spent years creating it.
[From.GetFirstName] hosted me for nearly a week, but we barely spent any time at court. Most of our days we roamed for the countryside, hunting in the [From.GetTitle]'s forest.
My [GetFromRelation] was a very kind host, spending most of these past days trying to catch up with what has happened in my life in the past few years.
[From.GetFirstName] and I found ourselves talking about religion for a surprising number of times during my stay, in the most respectable terms.
Yet, I simply couldn't get over some of my host's most annoying quirks.
It was an overall pleasant experience.
I undoubtedly felt welcome by my host's attitude.
Most of all, my host certainly proved [From.GetHerselfHimself] to be a great talker.
I never realized [From.GetFirstName] and I had so much in common...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has no concern for anyone but [From.GetHerselfHimself], happily trampling other people on the road of [From.GetHerHis] success. [From.GetHerHisCap] friends and family should be made wary of [From.GetHerHis] selfish, uncaring soul.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s inconstant nature is entirely unfitting of any grown [From.GetManWoman]. It is only right that I condemn [From.GetHerHis] behavior publicly.

I think it should always be good form to remind a bastard of [From.GetHerHis] proper place in [Root.Culture.GetName] society every once in a while. I am sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] will appreciate my thoughtfulness in this regard.

It is not enough for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be careless [From.GetHerselfHimself], [From.GetSheHe] needs to reprimand anybody else that shows the least amount of self-preservation. Such destructive behavior needs to be exposed and rightfully condemned.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a hopeless squanderer. It is baffling to me how anybody would entrust anything of value to such a [From.GetManWoman]. Warning other people about [From.GetHerHis] damnable habit would be nothing more than my duty.
It is well enough time that somebody exposed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s supposed chastity for what it really is - a poor attempt to hide the [From.GetManWoman]'s impotence.
It is well enough time that somebody exposed [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s supposed chastity for what it really is - a poor attempt to hide the [From.GetManWoman]'s barren womb.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s unimaginative and uncaring attitude towards life and [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities is a pathetic sight to behold. Yet some people seem to appreciate [From.GetHerHis] lack of any will or ambition. I should make sure that everyone knows of [From.GetHerHis] apathetic nature.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a coward. [From.GetHerHisCap] unacceptable behavior needs to be exposed and condemned if [From.GetSheHe] is ever to improve. By denouncing [From.GetHerHim] I would only do [From.GetHerHim] a favor.
It should not be hard to smear [From.GetTitledFirstName] given [From.GetHerHis] cruel disposition. Everybody needs to be reminded of [From.GetHerHis] ruthless attitude.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] barely conceals [From.GetHerHis] blasphemous lack of faith in [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Such a person should not be allowed to live in any proper society, [From.GetSheHe] should be shunned and condemned for [From.GetHerHis] heathen ways.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s duplicitous nature may be a secret to [From.GetHerHis] friends and family, but it is quite clear to me. I should expose [From.GetHerHis] lack of honesty so that everyone knows to be wary of [From.GetHerHis] forked tongue.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is already a sobbing wreck with little love for [From.GetHerHis] own life. I am certain that, with the right words, I will be able to push [From.GetHerHim] over the edge.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is always doing something, always working... Clearly [From.GetSheHe] doesn't trust [From.GetHerHis] own friends and family to handle even the simplest of tasks. I should make sure that everybody knows of [From.GetHerHis] disconcerting pettiness.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a pathetic drunk. I should just denounce [From.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has such a dull and forgettable personality, devoid of any spark of imagination, that I am surprised there is anybody willing to spend any amount of time listening to [From.GetHerHim]. Perhaps I should bring more light upon [From.GetHerHis] lack of intellect...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a petty, wicked-minded [From.GetManWoman], filled with hatred and self-loathing. As much as [From.GetSheHe] tries to hide [From.GetHerHis] deviousness, [From.GetHerHis] true nature is all too apparent to me. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how rotten [From.GetSheHe] is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] spends too much time studying ancient books from strange and mysterious authors. [From.GetHerHisCap] shady activities are obviously proof of [From.GetHerHis] heretical beliefs. I should expose [From.GetHerHis] wickedness for all to see.

I have it on good authority that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is less of a man. I should make sure that this shameful mutilation [From.GetSheHe] is afflicted by is something neither [From.GetSheHe] nor [From.GetHerHis] subjects ever risk forgetting.

The Church has already condemned [From.GetTitledFirstName] to eternal damnation by excommunicating [From.GetHerHim]. It is time somebody reminded [From.GetHerHim] that heretics of [From.GetHerHis] kind have no place left in society.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a insufferable, weak-willed [From.GetManWoman], without any worthy accomplishment to [From.GetHerHis] name. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how pathetic [From.GetSheHe] is.

Who could ever take [From.GetTitledFirstName] seriously? The [From.GetManWoman] is so fat I doubt [From.GetSheHe] would be able to ride a horse. It won't hurt me to remind [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] court of how pitiful [From.GetHerHis] state is.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is obsessed with food. Such self-indulgence should not go unpunished. It is only right that I condemn [From.GetHerHis] behavior publicly.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart is consumed by greed. A person so petty and materialistic has no place in civilized society. I should make my disdain for [From.GetHerHim] clear to everyone.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has never been able to learn the virtue of silence and discretion. [From.GetSheHeCap] is constantly talking and harassing everyone around [From.GetHerHim]. I should make it clear how much I despise [From.GetHerHis] obnoxious attitude.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s excesses are already known throughout the realm... Yet, maybe the people need a reminder of how lavish and depraved [From.GetHerHis] feasts really are...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a heretic, perverting the worship of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] with twisted, unholy rituals. What more is needed to disparage [From.GetHerHim]?

I can scarcely believe how a grown [From.GetManWoman] like [From.GetTitledFirstName] has yet to develop any sort of tact. [From.GetHerHisCap] bluntness is unbearable, and needs to be openly mocked if [From.GetSheHe] is ever to learn [From.GetHerHis] lesson about manners.

Some of [From.GetHerHis] sycophants would claim that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a very humble [From.GetManWoman], but how could [From.GetHerHis] quiet and self-deprecating attitude hide anything but cowardice? I must make sure that everyone knows the true nature of this wicked person.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing more than a deformed freak, yet [From.GetSheHe] still thinks that [From.GetSheHe] deserves any dignity? Maybe I should make it clear to [From.GetHerHim] how pathetic [From.GetHerHis] state is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] already has the reputation of a cruel, sadistic monster. It should be easy for me to build upon [From.GetHerHis] devious tendencies to further smear [From.GetHerHis] name and earn [From.GetHerHis] contempt.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is an infidel, worshiping false idols and forsaking the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. What more is needed to disparage [From.GetHerHim]?

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind is already vanishing. It is time somebody made it clear to [From.GetHerHim] that a [From.GetManWoman] with [From.GetHerHis] mental deficiencies has no place in proper society.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] already has a reputation for a strict and uncompromising character. [From.GetHerHisCap] lack of tact and understanding and blind following of rules and traditions will inevitably lead to [From.GetHerHis] perdition unless somebody reproaches [From.GetHerHim]...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is clearly a slave to [From.GetHerHis] own passion. It is only a matter of time before [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] rots [From.GetHerHis] lustful limbs away. I should warn the people around [From.GetHerHim] before [From.GetSheHe] drags somebody else into perdition.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been turned into a limping cripple, yet [From.GetSheHe] still thinks that [From.GetSheHe] deserves any dignity? Maybe I should make it clear to [From.GetHerHim] of how pathetic [From.GetHerHis] state is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a shell of a [From.GetManWoman], barely strong enough to stand on [From.GetHerHis] own. Who could ever respect such a pitiful creature? I should make sure everybody knows how pathetic [From.GetSheHe] is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a twitching, paranoid fool. If [From.GetSheHe] is unable to trust even [From.GetHerHis] closest friends and family, how can [From.GetSheHe] properly be part of civilized society? Surely, [From.GetSheHe] must be shunned away from it.

Some of [From.GetHerHis] sycophants would claim that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a very patient [From.GetManWoman], but how could [From.GetHerHis] quiet and condescending demeanor hide anything but cowardice? I must make sure that everyone knows the true nature of this wicked person.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a cursed maniac, [From.GetHerHis] skull a hollow cove for demons. I should just denounce [From.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] and I might share the same blood, but we have always been of very different minds. I could never stand the sight of my [GetFromRelation], and I think it's time I reminded [From.GetHerHim] of the reasons why once more.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has already the bad reputation of a weaselly, conniving [From.GetManWoman]. It should not be hard for me to further smear [From.GetHerHis] name by pointing out [From.GetHerHis] lack of honesty.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a licentious man with no self-control, always running after any sweet face he lays eyes on. Surely, denouncing his dissolute behavior will earn me his hatred, as well as smear his reputation.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is an indolent, pathetic creature, unwilling to perform the simplest task or take the smallest responsibility. I should denounce [From.GetHerHis] slothful attitude so that all can see it.

Why is [From.GetTitledFirstName] so mindful of what [From.GetSheHe] eats? It is said Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] woke up to [saint_person.GetHerHis] hands and feet bleeding profusely, only for it to miraculously heal a couple of minutes later. Such was [saint_person.GetHerHis] life, so closely following in the footsteps of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

It is said the body of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] has stayed the same as it was when [saint_person.GetSheHe] died, a pleasant floral smell filling the coffin. The miraculous incorruptibility of [saint_person.GetHerHis] body can only be proof of [saint_person.GetHerHis] rise to Heaven.

The stories of the miraculous healing of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] are numerous. [saint_person.GetSheHeCap] traveled all across the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] world, bringing the sick and injured back from the very brink of death.

They say [saint_person.GetFirstName] had prophetic foresight, being able to see things which would happen days, months or years later. Through [saint_person.GetHerHis] visions, Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] guided friends and family to avoid the dangers they would face.

It was often said that Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was so understanding of others that [saint_person.GetSheHe] would be able to practically read their minds. Despite [saint_person.GetHerHis] gift, [saint_person.GetSheHe] never used it for evil, and was truly a servant of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName], blessing those in [saint_person.GetHerHis] presence.

Many are those who work for [saint_person.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], but they all faded in the presence of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. It is said [saint_person.GetSheHe] ripped evil out of people, forcing them back into the right path in life for the glory of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Rumors say that the very servants of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] stepped down from Heaven to confer with Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. Feathers could be found all around [saint_capital.GetName] after these miraculous meetings, truly showing everyone what a virtuous person [saint_person.GetFirstName] was.

The story goes that a man was drowning in [saint_capital.GetName], when Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] ran across the water to help the poor drowning man. It was only after the man was safely rescued everyone understood the miracle which had just happened. Following the footsteps of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] so literally is only fitting for one as great as [saint_person.GetFirstName].

If one visits the church in [saint_capital.GetName], one will occasionally still hear the voice of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] among the singing voices of the faithful. Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was so pious that even after [saint_person.GetHerHis] death, [saint_person.GetSheHe] still attends the prayers to [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].

At a rare moment in [saint_person.GetHerHis] childhood fire suddenly blasted forth from [saint_person.GetHerHis] fingers, and that was only the first of several such occurrences. Random at first, [saint_person.GetSheHe] managed to control their blessed gifts and used it to help the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] world.

It is said one of the virtuous men of [saint_capital.GetName] was stuck under debris, and no matter how many men tried to help it was impossible to get the man out. Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] came across them, and prayed to [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName] to help them out. Afterwards the man could simply stand up and brush the debris off, as if it was as light as a feather. Such was the miraculous life of Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName].

After the martyred death of [saint_person.GetFirstName], it is said some people saw [saint_person.GetHerHim] walk back home to [saint_capital.GetName] with [saint_person.GetHerHis] head in [saint_person.GetHerHis] arms. After these visions, they suddenly came across a new burial site where they found the body of [saint_person.GetFirstName].

So much did [saint_person.GetSheHe] care about the people around [saint_person.GetHerHim] that [saint_person.GetSheHe] blessed the local water with the power of love. It has become a famous spot for pilgrims, to wish for love and happiness in their life. So strong was [saint_person.GetHerHis] faith in [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].
It is said Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] cared so much for life, [saint_person.GetSheHe] brokered a peace with the rats and had them move out peacefully rather than forcefully remove them.

Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] was often followed around by a dog which was never seen eating, drinking or interacting with anyone but Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName]. Stories go that [saint_person.GetFirstName] conversed with this creature from [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName], and was told how to go through life as a virtuous faithful [saint_person.GetManWoman].

Stories tell of how in the middle of a prayer, Saint [saint_person.GetFirstName] suddenly rose from the floor and floated above ground for several minutes. This periodically happened all throughout [saint_person.GetHerHis] life, showing us how [saint_person.GetSheHe] rose closer to Heaven even before [saint_person.GetSheHe] passed on.

Reforming the [Player.Religion.GetName] faith will turn it into an organized religion. Unless you control all of the Holy Sites, doing so requires §Y50§! Moral Authority and control of §Y3§! [Player.Religion.GetName] holy sites. It will cost you §R750§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]. Reforming a religion allows a ruler to determine the Nature, Doctrines and Leadership of the new faith, entirely reshaping its dogma.

Reforming the [Player.Religion.GetName] faith will turn it into an organized religion with a religious head. Unless you control all of the Holy Sites, doing so requires §Y50§! Moral Authority and control of §Y3§! [Religion.GetName] holy sites. It will cost you §R750§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]. Rulers of a Reformed [pagan_group.GetGroupName] religion can use the Holy War Casus Belli, get access to most succession laws, no longer suffer Prestige loss while at peace, and will have less trouble with independent minded vassals. However, they also lose the defensive supply limit penalty for religious enemies in their territory and vassals will get upset if you have their levies raised for too long for no good reason.

The §YLeader§! of a society is responsible for its integrity and also often manages members of lower ranks. The leader regulates promotions between ranks, handles membership applications and hands out tasks to lower-ranking members. In certain cases there can exist more than one leader, in which case the most senior one is shown above.
The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lords gathers from all across the world to bring [crusade_title.GetName] into the fold of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] kingdoms, and out of infidel hands.

It has been at the fringes of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands for ages, and it has been decided that it is time to properly bring it into the fold, and turn the people of [crusade_title.GetName] to the true Faith.

It has been at the fringes of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands for ages, and once again the Pope has decided it is time to try and bring them into the fold, and turn the people of [crusade_title.GetName] to the true Faith.
It was once a part of the core [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands, and lords from all across the world gathers to return it to their rightful hands.
It was once a part of the core [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands, and lords from all across the world gathers to fight for it in a grand war once more.
It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the Pope has decided it is time to bring them into the fold, and show them the true path to redemption.
It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the Pope has decided to try to bring them into the fold, and hopefully show them the path to true redemption.

[crusade_title.GetName] is currently in the hands of the blasphemous [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. Following the sacrilegious [crusade_character.Religion.GetName] [crusade_character.GetSheHe] has poisoned the lands and its people for too long.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the rule of the sly Hebrew infidel [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. It is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall under the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the tyrannic rule of the Mahomedan infidel [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. But with the upcoming [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught, it is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the rule of the barbaric heathen [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. It is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall under the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught.

I have decided to follow Papal will when it comes to the distribution of the Crusader state titles.

Decide what should happen if the Crusade is won and we are the biggest contributor to its success. Should we comply with the Papal suggestion, give the kingdom to our beneficiary, or claim it for ourselves?

This character had the honor of being born in the Purple Chamber of the Imperial Palace. As such, [Root.GetHerHis] succession claim is stronger than that of older siblings born before their parents ascended the throne.

This character is porphyrogennetos - literally "born in the purple." It is an honor bestowed only to children born of a ruling Basileus or Basilissa in the Purple Chamber of the Imperial Palace. Their succession claim is stronger than that of older siblings born before their parents ascended the throne.
If we retake control over enough former provinces of the old empire, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] would be reborn once again as [e_roman_empire.GetName].
If Rome and other key territories of the old empire could be reclaimed, the Byzantine Empire would win recognition in the eyes of the West as the true and rightful continuation of the Roman State.
This character is the current ruler of [e_roman_empire.GetName] and commands the respect an office of such magnitude is due.
This character is the current ruler of the restored Roman Empire and commands the respect an office of such magnitude is due.
